sources.title: Robbery (1967) When the mastermind plan is flawless… until it’s not.
sources.description:
A group of British criminals plan the robbery of the Royal Mail train on the Glasgow-London route.

Original title: Robbery
Alternative title: Rapina Al Treno Postale, Millionen-Raub

Director: Peter Yates
Writers: Edward Boyd, Peter Yates, George Markstein

Main cast:
Stanley Baker - Paul Clifton
Joanna Pettet - Kate Clifton
James Booth - Inspector George Langdon
Frank Finlay - Robinson
Barry Foster - Frank
William Marlowe - Dave Aitken
Clinton Greyn - Jack
George Sewell - Ben

Genres: Thriller, Crime
Release date: August 1, 1967 (UK)
Filming location: London, UK


https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL2gsu7VGzgdbtxZGahjOpER2huEhTG9Rb

 @CultCinemaClassics ​

metadata.Plot: A dramatization of the Great Train Robbery. While not a 'how to', it is very detail dependent, showing the care and planning that took place to pull it off.
metadata.Writer: Edward Boyd, Peter Yates, George Markstein
metadata.Actors: Stanley Baker, Joanna Pettet, James Booth
